pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, March 5, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion as part of the Prospectors & Developers Association of Canada Convention.

South Building
Metro Toronto Convention Centre
222 Bremner Boulevard

Notes for media:

  • Due to space restrictions, this event will be open for photography only, including broadcast and still photos.
  • Photographers wishing to attend are asked to register with Olivia.Pineau@edelman.com
  • Photographers registered to attend the armchair discussion are asked to present themselves to the Media Lounge, South Building, Room 602, no later than 9:30 a.m.
  • Journalists attending the conference will be provided a live feed of the armchair discussion in the Media Lounge, South Building, Room 602.
  • The armchair discussion will also be broadcast live on www.facebook.com/thePDAC/
